summary: Cthulhu is a made-up monster from a story by H. P. Lovecraft. It's a huge, scary creature that looks like a mix between an octopus, a dragon, and a person. The story, called "The Call of Cthulhu," was published in 1928. Cthulhu is super popular and has shown up in lots of movies, books, and games. It's like a giant, green monster that people worship, and it's part of a group of creatures called the Great Old Ones.
title: Cthulhu
